testimonials.name: Shah Bano Rao
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.testimonial: Code Kids has been the most enjoyable experience for my child. The pace of learning and the method of teaching is excellent!

testimonials.name: Muhammad Haroon
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.testimonial: Our daughter who is eight years old, took her first coding session with Code Kids. She was really engaged in the session and she looked forward to her next lesson.

testimonials.name: Fouzia Akram
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.testimonial: The word coding was making me confused that how a little kid can do coding but the affordable fee plan encourages me to enroll my daughter for the the basic course , and I must say it's worth trying.

testimonials.name: Alyna Baig
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.testimonial: This was my son's first time taking online coding class and it really exceeded my expectations. The flexibility and constant communication were what helped my son to continue.

testimonials.name: Aqsa Tahir
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.testimonial: It's amazing platform for kids to learn coding instead of wasting time on useless activities kids must learn such activities that will help them to grow in future.
